issues.description: The template StockIngredient class defines a quantity getter named retrieveQuantity(), but both Stock.java and Main.java call getQuantity() on StockIngredient. This signature mismatch will cause compilation errors and confuse students about which method to use.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename retrieveQuantity() to getQuantity() in StockIngredient (or add a getQuantity() alias that returns the same value) so that callers in Stock and Main can compile without errors.

issues.description: The getter for the StockIngredient.quantity field is named retrieveQuantity() in the template, but the sample code in Main.java and the reference solution use getQuantity(). Students will expect getQuantity() based on examples and solution, leading to confusion and compilation errors.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the retrieveQuantity() method in StockIngredient to getQuantity(), matching the sample usage and the solution implementation.
